website_summaries.verdict: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 is a great update to last year’s premium Android tablet but doesn’t make the case for ditching the iPad Pro, Surface Pro or other options.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 out-performs its predecessor with a more powerful processor, optimized DeX mode and increased storage space
It also gets a new minimalistic design and updated S Pen stylus
cons: The keyboard is not included, and it's expensive and takes time to adjust to its small keys
In the tablet/laptop hybrid wars, there’s little clamor for an Android model, especially in light of Android app support on Chromebooks

customer_reviews.title: It's good but...
customer_reviews.text: When I first received it I was blown away by how well it could handle the multitask. Watching videos and playing games with this this tab is just amazing! Taking down notes and drawing too! But, everything started to go downhill from here as I noticed the digitizer faulty. The screen started "ghost tapping" and I had to return the product for a lost. Still, good product tho but I received a faulty one. But I'm giving it 1 star for my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hor

customer_reviews.title: The best tablet at Android, but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Pros/cons/so so This tablet, actually, it's the best tablet at Android system, but isn't necessarily the best tablet of the market. Pros The building is excellent, the 3 colors options are so good, the display is so fine with that super amoled tech, beautiful colors and blacks, the sound system is awesome for a tablet (better than iPad Pro), it's light weight easy to carry on, robust processor and ram, SD expansion, the good answer and function of the S-Pen Cons: the not jack connector, it's so sad, the not premium sensation of the S-Pen and unfortunately, the Android system doesn't optimized to the best experience. Tab S6 is a good choice if you hate Apple, like me.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.text: Just recieved this in the mail today and i am currently writing this review on it!! Ordered just the tablet since the keyboard was not in stock. I just went to my nearest best buy and purchased it there. But all i can say right now is that i do not regret this purchase! Ill come and do an update once i have had time to play around with it and use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Richer33

customer_reviews.title: if you need new tablet do not buy this one
customer_reviews.text: unit failed after 10 days. return/replace process a circus. no offer to replace. all inconvenience born by customer.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Gene Brown

customer_reviews.title: LTE Verizon version WILL NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The IMEI number of this product is not recognize by Verizon. It will not connect. I spent over 4 hours with Verizon customer service, Verizon tech support, and the local Verizon store. (Photo attached.)
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: MICROSOFT OFFICE APPS NO LONGER AVAILABLE!  MFPOS
customer_reviews.text: Sneaky bastards- I researched for months to make sure this would work for me/us. It took days of digging the interwebs to discover that the main app I needed will no longer be supported - Samsung climbed in bed with Microsoft office and Office apps are no longer available. The ONLY option is to use them under MS online 360 plan with an outrageous monthly fee and no offline accessibility or privacy. Cant send it back. What a bunch of political bs.
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint Registration Problems
customer_reviews.text: I am working on my second Galaxy Tab S6. The first was returned due to fingerprint registration problems after an update. The second now has the same problem. The registration stops at 41% and will not go any further . Thinking about returning this second Tab S6! My feeling is that if a manufacturer states a product contains certain extras I feel those extras should work! I also understand certain banks no longer accept The Tab S6 for sign in using the fingerprint accessory! Samsung needs to approach this problem ASAP! Other than the fingerprint issue the Tab S6 works as well as any other less expensive Tablet!
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 is better than any iPAD.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tablet on the market today. Samsung knows how to take a very good operating system and make it awesome. It's intuitive, convenient and fun to use. The fingerprint sensor works great. Can't think of anything I would change with the tablet. From a software perspective, there are lots of fun tools that take advantage of the s-pen. However, there is not lots of productivity enhancing software to use with the s-pen. My favorite productivity enhancing product that works well with the s-pen is MS OneNote.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet 💖
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet! Reaching for it at home and in the office instead of my laptop. While it seemed a bit pricy for a tablet it has proven to be a good investment. It works with the BT keyboard from my old Samsung note 8 that it is replacing but I haven't really found a need for the keyboard. Really like the feel of the pen (and it comes with- take that iPad users). Bought it to take to a conference and fell in love.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Nowlin

customer_reviews.title: I have been ripped off!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I need wifi capabilities. The description said it was for Verizon customers. After I received the tablet, I entered the ECMI # on the Verizon website...not recognized. I returned it. Amazon has had it back for OVER TWO WEEKS & WON'T REFUND MY MONEY!!! I am VERY ANGRY!! Don't buy this tablet if you are a Verizon customer & ever want your money back when you find that it doesn't work with their network!!!
customer_reviews.author: SharonS

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Verizon Wireless as was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I could connect to the network but could not add the tablet to my verizon device list because verizon would not recognize it as compatible. Before you open the box, check the product label, go to verizon, add a device and enter the device id. If it reconizes it, you should be okay. I am returning the tablet and ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: carl knox

customer_reviews.title: Dead After 3 Weeks?
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 after reading and watching video reviews, I made the purchase, but after three weeks usage I turned it on and had half a screen and the other half were white lines on a black backdrop. The Tab S6 was still working but had only 50% of the screen with aggravating lines filling up the screen and made it impossible to use. Based upon YouTube videos, Samsung Tablets has had this recurring nuisance. Come on Samsung, 3 weeks? By the way, the Tablet was never dropped causing any internal parts to dislodge! Signed: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nu13

customer_reviews.title: Distribution please stop throwing / dropping products.
customer_reviews.text: Shipping container showed zero damage, however the Samsung packaging itself is damaged significantly. Maybe robot arm released it from too high, it landed on its poor corner in empty bin? Product appears fine showing no physical damage. Wifi randomly dropping twice so far in 2h. researching online concluded I'm not alone : several complaints regarding the S6 having random wifi disconnects, so possibly not caused from package damage Sometimes screen appears ... how to explain, " wave like"---waterbeds come to mind-- while scrolling. Pen is a pain in the butt placement wise, definitely a learning curve. Casual use of camera -- pics from phone look better in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: I've barely touched my desktop PC since!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Tab S6 (128GB) with the official cover for just over a month now and ever since I've barely touched my desktop PC. I love the fact that I can do many tasks virtually anywhere rather than being tied to my desk. The Tab S6 is the perfect device that fits between a tablet for media use and dragging around a bulky laptop. I would say that you shouldn't expect it to be a powerful laptop and you shouldn't expect it to be an inexpensive way to consume media.
customer_reviews.author: KevinCP

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: Had problems from the get go. Fingerprint technology didn't work and I kept getting a rainbow flickering line around the screen edges. When you took it from portrait to landscape mode it framed the portrait screen with flickering rainbow. Very annoying. Samsung tech people couldn't help either. At first we thought we had it fixed by resetting. That work for a very short period. I had reset the tablet at least 20 times getting the same affect. Finally sent it back to Amazon and bought another S6 Tablet from T-Mobile. No problems at all with T-Mobile. First S6 was a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Britt L. Watts

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Tab S6 for DJI Drone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tablet for fly my DJI Mavic Mini. DJI App loaded great with no issues. I can now fly the Mavic Mini with this new tablet. The screen quality is exceptional, and I can now see what the heck I'm doing with the DJI App with the larger screen. The Samsung tablet processor quality is great, NO jittery screen motions super vibrant The Pen is great and very precise, I really like the Pen hover modes I may add more information as time passes / so far everything is working just fine
customer_reviews.author: K. Ainsworth

customer_reviews.title: No headphone jack
customer_reviews.text: Nice tablet, except there is no option for headphones. The usb c port supposedly supports a dongle for headphones. The dongle I have was not recognized by the tablet. I spent a lot of time on the phone with India to no avail. An amazon rep referred me to a dongle (which I purchased), and will have to wait and see if it works. Bottom line - you can't listen with headphones and have your charger plugged in at the same time. This is my last samsung purchase. I will look elsewhere for my next tablet purchase,
customer_reviews.author: Lars

customer_reviews.title: Not Verizon compatible
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as Verizon network. Verizon could not activate mine so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet that could be even greater
customer_reviews.text: As all have already posted, the pen design sucks. With that said, this a great tablet and very fast. Much better product than the latest iPAD. Don't have to deal with forcing me to use their stuff to get to files. Put a 500G microSD in that bad boy and am quite happy. Don't like all not being admin as all the Samsung crap on there I can't remove but I just don't use it. Could root it at some point when I get bored. Bixby needs to be shot in head. Perhaps they could partner with Alexa? Regardless, this is a great tablet.
customer_reviews.author: The Way man

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even boot
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it because it didn't passed by the boot screen. After talking to both Amazon and Samsung support, nothing could be done.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Morales

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLET
customer_reviews.text: Love this tablet. The size is perfect for my purposes. I use it for reading books, playing games, and catching up on the news. The display is fabulous. So clear and colorful. I have a 5 year old Samsung tablet that is having battery issues so I got this new one. Samsung is a terrific brand. Great products and very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: The best iPAD alternative
customer_reviews.text: We started off with an iPAD... having an Galaxy S9 did not make the switch between the phone and the pad very intuitive. We upgraded for the Galaxy Pad and man am I impressed. The quality and the build are amazing! Even the thinner bezel around the screen is much cleaner than the iPAD's. The pen is a totally different experience! The response is as close as it can get to a real pen. Sketching is super fun! A great tool for my beautiful fiancee for her every day work as a designer! Having everything at your finger tips while you are out in the field is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: C Mastory

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the ipad, get this sweet tablet.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new tablet as my iPad was old and many apps would no longer update. I was also tired of iTunes and wanted something other than IOS. I read some good reviews of this tablet and took the plunge. Glad I did. So easy to copy movies and music from my PC, no more iTunes. Also I love that I can stick an SD card in this thing boosting storage. Can't do that on an ipad. Performance is excellent as is battery life. Much superior to the ipad in most every way.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Batty

customer_reviews.title: No keyboard?!
customer_reviews.text: The product description is extremely misleading. It makes it seem that it comes with a keyboard. After it arrived without one, I went back to see the description again to make sure I read it correctly. After scrutinizing the description, I finally found asterisk where it says keyboard sold separately. Amazon, you really need to the descriptions honest. It’s very frustrating and makes me think twice about buying from you.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R. Sacco

customer_reviews.title: Samsung requires access to all my data in my Google acct in order to set up the tablet
customer_reviews.text: Unless I hear otherwise, I will be forced to return this device for that reason. I, of course, haven't used the device since I was unable to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: EMG

customer_reviews.title: Aggravating!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pricey tablet, but I bought it because I use my tablet so much and wanted something that would perform. It set up very easily from my old Samsung and I only had to reinstall a few things. It has a nice display that is just the right size for a tablet. BUT, is is so aggravating because it keeps losing the wifi. None of my other devices do this, so I know it is the tablet, not my router. Please, Samsung, I hope it is a firmware issue and it will be corrected at the next upgrade. So, only 3 stars it gets. I will edit my review if the problem gets corrected.
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Ooohh ... I so wanted to love this tablet, but ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was an excellent Android tablet ... Fast, great display, super sound. But ... There is a noticeable dead spot on the screen using the pen. Big dead circular area on the upper right ... Can't draw anything with the pen. Samsung said they'd service it. So now I'm without until I get it mailed back. Not ok.
customer_reviews.author: QYC

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet.  Loud speakers great keyboard, great hardware and software.
customer_reviews.text: Its one of the best tablets money can buy. Its expensive but with the harware life the screen and storage space plus the fast processor its worth the money. Great accessories but I would like a tough light case that has keyboard access and a kickstand. Currently had to custom make a case for it. I would suggest the Korean unlocked 🔓 version as it has the 5G LTE. First tablet to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: used specifically for programs for our plane
customer_reviews.text: We bought this tablet because it came highly recommended by other private pilots as being fast, accurate, good battery life and dependability. Now that we have ours, we know these to be true. It has a clearly readable screen (a MUST for reading NOTAMS, weather warnings, and GPS. We found all these programs and more for FREE (they do not come on the tablet but are free for you to download). We have not yet found any program that would not work with it which is a pleasant surprise. If you fly and want to put away the paper maps, etc that clutter up your cockpit try this. Moving into the 21st century with flying is wonderful :).
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Bixby HiJacked the Power OFF button
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly for playing Golf Clash game. It works great for that. However, Samsung in their infinite wisdom decided to use the Power OFF button to summon the vile BIXBY. You cannot shut off power by simply holding the POWER OFF button - like every other device on planet earth. The tablet loses two stars for that daily annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: Cagayan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tablet for reading books and watching documentary!
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is lightweight and beautiful. I was worried it may be too small for reading PDFs and documents but it proves me wrong. The beautiful display with blue light filter helps reduce eyes train, the battery lasts very long compared to a phone, the lightweight does not put too much stress on my hand and arm. These are a perfect combination for long read. This is much cheaper than Ipad Pro 11 and includes a pen. The Android ecosystem is pretty good if you are not artist. The performance is speedy and can do almost anything. I hope Samsung will make next year model 11 inches wider and lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Quang Do

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, not amazing
customer_reviews.text: This was an "upgrade" from an S3 I had that cracked. The screen is slightly nicer and the sound is certainly better but then I am underwhelmed by the lack of power this thing has compared my last tablet and also to the latest ipad pro. I get this is not in the same league as the ipad but my oh my can we get something in league with that already in android land? I'm sick of these half baked products. There's not even a flash on the camera, seriously wth... Many issues with android itself but that's written somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Chubbycherub

customer_reviews.title: NO HEADPHONE JACK
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS NO HEADPHONE JACK. you will need to use wireless, so my wonderful, cushioned, plug and play headphones won't work. They don't make this clear in the advertising. Im returning it and getting an older model.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Arambarry

customer_reviews.title: Top of line as of my review.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot of tablets and I have to say this is a very nice tablet, alot of storage 256gb and a very fast processor in it also, and it has 8 gig of ram. It also has a micro sd slot to put more storage on, this is about the best Samsung has to offer atm, and its worth the price tag, if you don't think so go ipad shopping and end up spending more for something with no micro sd card slot.
customer_reviews.author: MasterS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is amazing the pen is the reason I bought it. With squid notes this is THE BEST electronic note taking experience. The tablet is also incredibly fast, the battery is hugely improved from my old s3 tab. The speakers are also intensely louder than the previous models. Really for half the price of an iPad pro you get a better experience with the pen. In apps like squid and the GUI in general gesture support with the pen is top notch. It allows me to never need menus when drawing and note taking.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Friedlein

customer_reviews.title: A Must Buy...
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Tablet screen is good, battery is good, also fast 8gig of ram is excellent + 256 of space is more than enough & you can add a good size SD card as well up to a one terabyte. I got a 256 card... A must buy... at this price $651 & change that's with Tax........Not bad.....
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from a Tab S3. The Tab S6 runs circles around the S3. I'm happy that I upgraded. More RAM, more storage, faster chip and better looking, larger screen. Most people should be able to compare specs for the tablets they are shopping for. You may find another tablet that will out performs this tablet, but it's going to cost several hundred dollars more. The additional cost vs additional performance was not worth it for me. Very happy with this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: A definite worthwhile alternative to laptop or Surface!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet! It was a risk, but I bought it to replace my Surface Pro 3 when it died on me. So far, I've been able to do just about everything I've needed to and it has such a small footprint and it's super lightweight. It's a bit of an adjustment when it comes to using Dex, but I like it a lot! I love having the ability to use it either as a regular Android tablet AND/OR a pseudo-PC! Unless you need to use software that is totally incompatible with Android, this is definitely a good option instead of buying a laptop or Surface for mobile computing! I hugely recommend this device over a Chromebook!
customer_reviews.author: KIWIKKI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent android tablet! Way faster processor than earlier models.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best android tablet of this year and ever. The Tab S6 is really useful for gaming and Internet consumption as it has the snapdragon 855 and over 7000 Mah battery. I use it to game on and for minor work related tasks. Watching movies is great with its 1440p screen and also youtube videos. The S pen is far better than the Galaxy tab s4 and the proccesor would destroy it. The galaxy tab line has shown more progress than apple's ipad though some would say apple is still ahead. Great buy and I can't wait to see what is next from Samsung!
customer_reviews.author: Review Man

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous tablet. But the problem that I had is that it kept on freezing. Factory reset twice, technical support with Amazon and Samsung best option was to return it. So I did
customer_reviews.author: DLTX5

customer_reviews.title: Love this tablet! Great pictures, great function, just great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new tablet this is the best tablet ever. Only I've never had a tablet so I can't really compare it to anything else LOL. But I have gotten some really great pictures out of it. I can't complain about even one thing I love it! Would recommend to anyone and I was really impressed by the fact that Amazon gave me this tablet on a payment arrangement which was wonderful them because this is a very high price item and it made it so that I was able to afford it. Thanks Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Can't adjust brightness for movies!
customer_reviews.text: Videos from netflix and amazon are generally too dark and zero settings to adjust it, at least that is what the tech support from Samsung's chat said. Are you kidding me? $600 and I can't adjust the brightness of the video output? And no the brightness display in settings doesn't do anything for the movies. The tablet itself is fantastic but all the bells and whistles about its camera and display and you cant even increase the brightness of a movie? Possibly petty but absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J. Hathaway

customer_reviews.title: Freezing screen?  Disappointed with replacement too!
customer_reviews.text: My first impression has been very favorable, however I began to see a pattern of "freezing up". This forces me to restart. Has anyone else experienced this? Update: got a replacement and I'm using my old tablet. Just don't understand why there is an S6 and S 7 now available. Actually not pleased with the S6. If you have an S5e...SAVE YOUR MONEY. Their near identical. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Dlaindy

customer_reviews.title: Possibly the best android tablet in 2019
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a s a gift for my father and he likes it. He is older, around 75 so he doesn't use all of its features. For all of the simple things it works well, seems well built and has good battery life. Note that the larger 256GB capacity also has more ram, not a huge deal just something to keep in mind when making your decisions. No issues yet, I will try to update if anything changes. I use an iPad Pro gen 3 and it almost makes me want to convert to android tablets.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Candelabra

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few months now and regret buying it. The screen quality is great, and I love the S-pen, but the tablet has a couple of quirks that bug me. Most annoying is the lack of a headphone jack or dongle. Watching a video on a plane or in your home without disturbing those around you is a major hassle. Hard to understand why they couldn't pay attention to the details when selling this tablet at an exorbitant price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this so far. I hope it does hold up. All electronics seem a bit iffy. But I had a samsung tablet for 7 years and replaced the battery (not samsungs) and it is still working. The new one has a better screen, and it is really thin. I do wish they had left a little more room for your fingers on the edge. LOL I am always opening something i don't want. But I like the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet ever
customer_reviews.text: wow, this is an amazing tablet. I've used it for everything from home to work. It gets the job done! It also feels good in the hand and the pen works great. I love using android os vs IOS and this tablet is great with performance.
customer_reviews.author: PikaSayjin

customer_reviews.title: Great Android Tablet for 2020.
customer_reviews.text: Likes: Lightning Quick. Very Responsive thumb scanner and touch screen. Updated Software support which is new for Samsung. Light weight but durable feeling. Sound is incredible. Not an Ipad :) Dislike: The lack of work put on the case/keyboard is almost unforgiving. This almost mad me send back the tablet. I'm getting by on a third party which is silly.
customer_reviews.author: MattyK

customer_reviews.title: Constantly lost connection to WiFi
customer_reviews.text: After a week, I sent it back because it would not maintain connection to WiFi. I had to regularly "Forget" and add my home network back. Upon further research, I found this has been a problem Samsung has battled since at least 2014 on many of their devices. I loved the tablet, but a stable WiFi connection is a must for me, so I made the plunge to an iPad, after having been a loyal Android user since.... well, since Blackberry lost marketshare!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for some time now. I can definitely say this is the best tablet I've ever owned. Great graphics, fast tablet & bright display. From my point of view it compares to an iPad (my son & son-in-law both have i-pads...high end) but the Galaxy S-6 seems to me to compare with quality w/out the $1,000 price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Fintie cases for Samsung tablets for years! Never a disappointment. This one is no exception. The pen space is awesome. This is the first Samsung tablet that I have owned that did not have the pen storage inside of the tablet. I was skeptical of this design, but it works great! I also love that the closed cover turns off the display, and the open cover wakes it up. Awesome value for the money. My last one outlived the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Green

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars all around
customer_reviews.text: - Great quality: Light weight but sturdy - Battery lasts for days even when heavily used - Screen quality is fantastic - Easy to transfer data from my older tablets Expensive, but worth it as long as you take care of it and can get a few years of usage out of it.
customer_reviews.author: SomeGuyOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great for artists!
customer_reviews.text: Currently typing this review with my s6! As an artist I absolutely love this tablet! Bought an SD card for storage and I'm set up on space now. The pen is fantastic! If the battery runs out it does not stop your ability to draw, you just lose the remote functionality of the pen. I use infinite painter on this for all my art. Unfortunately there is a severe lack of good art apps on Android compared to the Apple store, but I'm hoping one day that will change. Only con I've seen so far is there is the occasional lag if I have a lot of apps open at the same time, but closing them fixes the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jameless

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: You won't regret it. I've gotten this device during black Friday and never had any issues or regrets. It's a beautiful device and powerful one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kervin

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this tablet
customer_reviews.text: My husband is so pleased with his tablet , it was well boxed, and it came pretty quick , the picture quality is Beautiful and it is fast . When he plays games it is amazing on the picture , it is bright and very colorful and it changes quickly also . Very happy and it is so much better then what he had expected. Just like what is on the pic when you look at them . Thank u .
customer_reviews.author: lisa jaworowski

customer_reviews.title: Screen scratches very easily.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the keyboard cover with this, as I was concerned about the pen being on the back. I noticed some scratches within days, I wish I'd returned it because I just noticed a bunch of scratches in a row along the edge of the screen that looks like the keys on the keyboard have rubbed the screen. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Very good tablet. I am not a tablet fan, however I needed one to control my snart home devices and this worked GREAT! I tried with the Lenovo tablet at first and it struggled to stream my wifi cameras and I could see the potential of it slowing down as I added more smart home applications to it. So I sent it back and bought this tablet and it was a significant difference, happy with the purchase, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kmak

customer_reviews.title: Great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This replaced another tablet that was almost 10 years old. Although the screen isn't as big as my old tablet, the screen and performance as well as the battery life are tremendous.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet with superb built in speakers
customer_reviews.text: This Tab S6 is everything I ever wanted in a high performance Tablet. I snatched it at a great sale price of $528 & I am sure I will get many years of great service out of it. It is solid built and a good feel within a protective folder case with amazing speaker performance so it is not necessary to have a bluetooth speaker with it to watch movies on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: This tablet is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I can't put it down. I'm a big fan of Samsung. I buy all my electronics from them. This tablet surpasses my expectations. It is light, super fast and the display is beautiful. I bought the rose gold and I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: SIMONE DUQUESNAY

customer_reviews.title: Undoubtedly the best Android tablet I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have been an Android user for over 10 years. I've owned several tablets and phones. This is the fastest, most powerful and most versatile Android tablet I have ever owned. It out performs my iPad Pro 2 12.9 hands down. The DEX environment makes it a rival for the Winnows hybrids that I also own. Samsung has a real winner here.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The colors on this tablet are so bright and clear. It works well and charges well. I've had this for several months and I enjoy using it. It works well with the pen and without it. The only problem I've had is that when I'm on Zoom people say they are having a hard time hearing me and my volume is on high. Otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: It has been a few years since owning the Nvidia Shield tab, so I decided to buy a new one and this lives up to the hype, but not all my wants, but then again, nothing does, yet. Prices are getting a little out of control, so you have to want to shell out serious money for this luxury. In the future, I'll be running Termux and trying to use DeX for Node.js development, will report back.
customer_reviews.author: Tim90210

customer_reviews.title: It's ... OK
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for business use, specifically to show product options, presentations, and videos on a larger form factor. The device has been sitting unused on my table for the past two months. None of those use cases ever came to fruition. Think long and hard before you decide you need to sink hundreds of dollars into this device.
customer_reviews.author: Just Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is the flagship android tablet to buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased Samsung decided to keep the android platform tablet! I find android superior to Apple in May aspects, not the least of which that android is easier to navigate. I've configured mine to act as a wifi phone. Works incredibly well no matter where I go. The only thing I don't like is the loose (magnetic) stylis. The remote control features of the smart stylis are awesome! I just hate having to be hyper vigilant to be sure it doesn't fall off. The quality of everything else is superior!
customer_reviews.author: arkirby3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet, but that stylus....
customer_reviews.text: To put it simply I love my new tablet. Its functions great, looks beautful and crisp, and has increddible volume level. 2 main complaints would be that sometimes i expeirince screen lag where it doesnt want to register that i clicked but it happens infrequently enough not to hinder function. Also the stylus, my favorite part, is charged in the stupidest spot on the tablet. You will lose it more than once. That is a huge drag for me. but other than that Im very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DreadedMartian

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet but fix the pen slot so it holds the S pen securely
customer_reviews.text: Love the tablet and the pen works great. The only problem I have had is the pen falls out of the magnetic pen slot. I mistakenly bought an extra pen and was going to return it but the original pen fell out of its slot and our puppy found it. No more S pen. Samsung needs to fix this problem. I'm investing in a case that holds the pen securely.
customer_reviews.author: Remove review

customer_reviews.title: extremely disappointed in this tablet
customer_reviews.text: I have had to return 2 tablets so far because the screen goes black during usage, the customer support is none existent. It seems to be a hardware problem, i would definitely buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dhurel

customer_reviews.title: Stuck on Samsung logo
customer_reviews.text: Would not go past the Samsung logo screen. I reset it several times and it just kept getting stuck at the same place and I couldn't shut it off. Will definitely be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: regalle

customer_reviews.title: Is not working.
customer_reviews.text: It does not work. It says Samsung on the screen. It does nothing else. I can't turn it off. I want a replacement or my money back.
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders
customer_reviews.text: This product works perfectly as stated. It has more features that my last tablet as I am still encountering them. I easily transferred my apps from my old tablet to my new one and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Man of Grace

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: So far it's great. The picture and sound quality is perfect. The fingerprint sensor seems to get better the more I use it. DeX mode is a nice feature and convenient for emailing and online shopping without having to pull out your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Who needs a TV, this does it all.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Tablet and great value for the price. Lightweight with pen that is very responsive and narrow so those of us with small hands can use it easily. Easy set up. Great for veiwing movies, screen is large and picture is very sharp. Definately very happy witht his product. Wish it had a headphone jack in addition to the bluetooth. Would highly recomend this item to seniors who travel or those who full time RV and have limited space, could replace TV it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLET!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love my new tablet, the screen, able to take pics by clicking the pen, it's fast, clear. Can't say enough. I hope it'll last more than the 5 years they usually last. Thank you Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Reliable Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet don't like where they put the pen.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new tablet. Very reliable but the only thing that I don't like is the position of the pen. The pen is held by a magnetic part but it can fall anytime. That part is no good. I wonder why the thought that was a good idea. I lost mine already, nothing else is holding it. For the rest I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Audio
customer_reviews.text: Quality audio fidelity truly matters to me. I had read that the fidelity was great...but this tablet is amazing if music matters. This tablet does not need external speakers. The bass is true and the volume is incredible. Other essential qualities are great but if audio matters this is the tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Gober

customer_reviews.title: The best android tablet of 2019
customer_reviews.text: The best android tablet of 2019. Screen, battery, speed, sound, pen. If you want a android tablet to run anything, without the restrictions of the iOS... buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Hosoume

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL TABLET & WORKS WONDEFULLY
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to make my 6 year old's home school remote learning easier. It is a great device. I'm happy I purchased this for myself , and my son can benefit as well a great deal. It is a beautiful devicd. Arrived brand new and flawless!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Classy C

customer_reviews.title: Received a used one
customer_reviews.text: I had paid for a brand new one and received a used one that I could not even setup as it was synced to the previous user. Was in very good condition but due to recent world events, I cannot get it serviced so I can use it and thus will be returning it and looking to purchase somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: NuRbS

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tablet so much. It's a dream. The display looks great. Tablet is responsive and smooth. E-books are easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkly Raven

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money....
customer_reviews.text: Have to get used to the stylus...tend to press button while holding and uneven pressure causes weird writing on the screen. Easy to use otherwise, no issues. Arrived well packaged and protected.
customer_reviews.author: DRE

customer_reviews.title: Best Tablet I have ever owned....
customer_reviews.text: This is an upgrade from my Galaxy Tab S2, which is EXCELLENT. Also, a replacement for my iPAD Air II and iPAD. This tablet is powerful, fast, portable, and versatile. Battery lasts multiple days depending on application. And Samsung Dex is AWESOME! I love this tablet!!!
customer_reviews.author: B. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Thin Cover
customer_reviews.text: Uses magnets to attach to my Samsung tablet. Easy on and easy off. If you don't need the easy off, get a cover that clips onto the corners of your Samsung tablet. This cover turns off the display when it's closed and turns it on when opened.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I use it for digital art projects. Love the pen. Took off one star because update to Android 10 broke a few apps. Primarily, a backwards compatibility issue with Android. Not Samsung's fault but it still affects usability.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: get the tablet. It has  all the features as the phone for less $$$$.
customer_reviews.text: Hate no jack! great speakers louder that my 12 I bought a few yrs ago. slit screen, slide out panel. Notes fixes your bad writing ! And you save about 350 or so to get tab instead of phone. Hold out till they copy apple again and put the jack back in. I read it somewhere. Samsung always figures out how to rip us off. well ha ha ..... No jack in box you profit cheep cheeps .......
customer_reviews.author: Dorrise

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very fast processing speed, crystal clear pixilation, little eye fatigue (large text but lite enough to hold), use the pen often to jot notes. The touch screen is very responsive but the size is a bit wide so little more difficult to thumb type in vertical mode.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best tablet ever. So many features! My favorite is that I can record my screen whatever it is I'm doing whether it's watching a video I can record it or if I'm browsing something it can record it basically anything you do you can record
customer_reviews.author: Urijah

customer_reviews.title: Great Device
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this tablet. It is my favorite device to use. Multitasking is seamless and graphics are great. The screen is nothing short of incredible and the sound quality is surprisingly good for factory speakers. This tablet is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MP401

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SCREEN RESOLUTION, EASY TO USE, STURDY AND DOES EVERYTHING YOU NEED A TABLET TO DO.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my girlriend's Tab S2. The only downside is the magnetic stylus holder. The stylus is prone to falling and could easily be lost. That's a small inconvenience when compared to the Tab S6's performance, light weight and ease of use. Girlfriend is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Have not gotten to fully use this tablet but by far i can say finally samsung created an amazing phablet. Remonds me of the note phones which is what i have own for the past 10 years and i love them. Wish the pen had more security tho. It attaches to the back of the tablet towards the top only so it can easily be thrown off. A secure case should help.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my tablet yesterday upgrading from the tab S2 all I can say is WOW ! I'm going to play around with it for a few days and I will update. Thank you Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a buy now or wait till the TabS7 comes out and you might save a buck on the S6
customer_reviews.text: By farrrrrrr the best tablet I ever had. Beats my iPad in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Sams

customer_reviews.title: What a steal
customer_reviews.text: I went looking and found in amazin the samsung tab s6. It was used good condition. What a steal plus Amazon offered up to 25% of 500. So very pleased with this tablet purchase. Thanks amazon. I got it a screen protector and a cool tablet cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Hansell

customer_reviews.title: Just a bigger screened Samsung phone -- Nowhere near Ipad or Surface Pro/X
customer_reviews.text: Stylus kept failing (dot is like 1cm off of where the stylus lands) -- changes tips, re-calibrated... kept doing it. Cant run many things on it. Opted for a Microsoft Surface Pro 7. Love that thing.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Quain

customer_reviews.title: The S-pen is the weakest part but still a great Tablet
customer_reviews.text: There's no much to say. You get what you pay for. This tablet is a beast and is the best on the market. The only downside would be size and shape of the s-pen. It isn't really conducive to the fingers and it doesn't make drawing feel good. It feels more like a task. I read a lot of digital comics so I have little to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harris-Williams

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tablet
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tablet. If you are a droid and not that other brand of operating systems.... this is the tablet to own if you have the money. You are not settling for anything if you buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Looking

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME VALUE
customer_reviews.text: After dealing with the hell of trying to purchase this directly from Samsung unsuccessfully for 2 days I ended up buying it here with ease...the tablet is everything I was looking for and an awesome upgrade from the one I had. I'm very happy with the performance of this tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I had Tab S4 and upgraded to Tab s6. Finally a tablet with a strong CPU. Everything runs very smooth. The screen and sound of this table are incredible. It has Dolby Atmos. I also like Dex Mode a lot. I hope Samsung will keep improving Dex mode.
customer_reviews.author: Starfall

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Samsung Galaxy Tab S2 with this Tab S6. Great screen and speakers. Very fast and supports all the newer technology than my old S2. Had great success and reliability with my S2 and I'm sure this S6 will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mangold

customer_reviews.title: Great screen if you want something this large.
customer_reviews.text: Its exactly what I wanted. At 10.5 inch your not going to comfortably one hand this. But the screen size is exactly what I wanted. I use it (amongst other things) to fly my new DJI Mavric Air 2.
customer_reviews.author: Greg C.

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 10.5", 128GB WiFi Tablet Mountain Gray - SM-T860NZAAXAR
product_meta.description: Style:Tablet only| Size:128GB| Color:Mountain Gray| Configuration:Wifi OnlyImagine a more personal PC experience—without a PC. Meet the Galaxy Tab S6, the ultra-slim 2-in-1 that performs like a laptop with the mobility of a tablet. Get more done as you switch seamlessly from app to app, task to task. Go all out with an intuitive s pen that lets you work, create and edit with ease. When it's time to kick back, you can stream shows and game on a spectacular screen with cinematic sound. And make it all happen with a fast-charging battery that keeps up with you all day. Connectivity to ANT+: Yes. Color Depth: 16M.
feature_bullets: The 2 in 1 that’s your all in 1; Instantly transform your Android tablet into a PC desktop experience when you attach the keyboard with built in trackpad
Power to multitask; Thanks to the speed of the fast mobile processor, rapidly switch between apps and tasks or immerse yourself in graphic intensive games; Plus, get PC caliber internal RAM

All new S Pen included; Now the included S Pen lets you pause and skip at the press of the button; Plus, you can still mark up papers, sign docs and take notes; The S Pen even attaches magnetically for easy storage and charging

Light on weight; Heavy on entertainment; With a spectacular edge to edge Super AMOLED display, superior graphics and quad speakers tuned by AKG, get drawn into immersive games all on a 2 in 1 that only weighs about a pound.Bluetooth v5.0 (LE up to 2 Mbps)
More hours of power; With up to 15 hours1on a full charge, you can create and edit all day, plus enjoy continuous browsing and streaming; Then quickly recharge the Fast Charging battery
Disclaimer - Based on laboratory testing. Battery life depends on usage. Compatible keyboard sold separately.

specifications.Wireless Type: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth, 5 GHz Radio Frequency, 2.4 GHz Radio Frequency
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,833 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
